name: mikroe.click.lr6
short_description: LR 6 Click is a compact add-on board designed for ultra-long-distance spread-spectrum communication. This board features the Ra-01S, a LoRa™ wireless radio frequency module from Ai-Thinker Technology, featuring the SX1268 radio chip. This module provides exceptional sensitivity of over -148dBm, a power output of +22dBm, and supports multiple modulation methods, including LoRa™, within the 433MHz frequency band. The board offers robust anti-interference capabilities and low power consumption, making it ideal for applications requiring reliable long-range communication.
